byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Exports: Roosevelt signs Act to Expedite Natl Defense; it bans sale of armaments to foreign nations unless Army or Navy chiefs certify they are not essential to natl defense
snippet: WASHINGTON, July 1--The government has practically shut down during the last ten days on the supply to Britain of munitions from the United States Army and Navy stocks....

headline.main: Act Signed to Ban Arms Sales to Britain From Surplus Stocks of the Army and Navy

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 1--The government has practically shut down during the last ten days on the supply to Britain of munitions from the United States Army and Navy stocks.
